上不了厅堂，下得了厨房。敲得了代码，逮得住蟑螂。

## 你好
```{r}
library(MASS)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(openxlsx)
df <- read.xlsx("~/desktop/UEFA.xlsx")
str(df)
```


```{r}
df1 <- df %>% select (League, Shots:Fouls) %>% 
  filter(League != "Other Leagues")
model <- lda(League ~ ., data = df1)
model
```


```{r}
DAscores <- predict(model)$x
iris_DAsocres <- cbind(df1, DAscores)
head(iris_DAsocres)
```
